profileText: a Representative from Indiana; born on February 24, 1984; home schooled; A.S., Indiana University South Bend, South Bend, Ind., 2009; B.S., Indiana University South Bend, South Bend, Ind., 2011; M.B.A., University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, Ind., 2019; staff, campaign of United States Representative Jackie Walorski of Indiana, 2011-2012; member, Indiana state judicial nominating commission; business executive; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the death of United States Representative Jackie Walorski, and reelected to the succeeding Congress (November 8, 2022-present).
